title: Splitting and expliciting the de Rham complex of the Drinfeld space
abstract:
Let $p$ be a prime number, $K$ a finite extension of $\mathbb{Q}_p$ and $n$
an integer $\geq 2$. We completely and explicitly describe the global sections
$\Omega^\bullet$ of the de Rham complex of the Drinfeld space over $K$ in
dimension $n-1$ as a complex of (duals of) locally $K$-analytic representations
of $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$. Using this description, we construct an explicit section
in the derived category of (duals of) finite length admissible locally
$K$-analytic representations of $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$ to the canonical morphism of
complexes $\Omega^\bullet \twoheadrightarrow H^{n-1}(\Omega^\bullet)[-(n-1)]$.
